p: The experimental procedures were conducted in accordance with Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) guidelines [ 30, 31], complied to the ethical standards of EU Directive 2010/63/EU for animal experiments, and was conducted with proper animal handling under well-founded conditions in accordance with the recommendations of guide for the care and use of animals [ 32]. The protocol was approved by the Research Ethics Committee of Mbarara University of Science and Technology and registered with Uganda National Council for Science and Technology (UNCST).
